verses.name: Luke 14:12
verses.text: Then said he also to him that bade him, When thou makest a dinner or a supper, call not thy friends, nor thy brethren, neither thy kinsmen, nor thy rich neighbours; lest they also bid thee again, and a recompence be made thee.

verses.name: Luke 14:13
verses.text: But when thou makest a feast, call the poor, the maimed, the lame, the blind:

verses.name: Luke 14:14
verses.text: And thou shalt be blessed; for they cannot recompense thee: for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just.
